src_original: prāptirasaṃjñisamāpattinirodhasamāpattirāsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgatā  jātirjarā sthitiranityatā nāmakāyāḥ padakāyāḥ vyañjanakāyāḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ pravṛttiḥ  śubhakṛtsnavītarāgasyoparyavītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe asaṃjñisamāpattiriti prajñaptiḥ //
ākiṃcanyāyatanavītarāgasya bhavāgrāduccalitasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa (Abhidh-s 11)  manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhe nirodhasamāpattiriti prajñaptiḥ //
jīvitendriyaṃ katamat /  nikāyasabhāge pūrvakarmāviddhe sthitikālaniyame āyuriti prajñaptiḥ //
nikāyasabhāgaḥ katamaḥ /  teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃ stasmin sattvanikāye ātmabhāvasadṛśatāyāṃ nikāyasabhāga iti prajñaptiḥ //
jātiḥ katamā /  nikāyasabhāge prabandhāvipraṇāśe sthitiriti prajñaptiḥ //
padakāyāḥ katame /  dharmāṇāṃ viśeṣādhivacane padakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ //
vyañjanakāyāḥ katameḥ tadubhayāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu vyañjanakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
hetuphalāśupravṛttau java iti prajñaptiḥ //  anukramaḥ katamaḥ /
